sources.title: TTEC Holdings Sued Over Tobacco Penalty in Employee Health Plan
sources.snippet: Colorado-based customer service company TTEC Holdings Inc. was hit with a proposed class action saying it wrongly charges workers who smoke higher rates for health insurance without giving them a valid option for having the penalty waived..
